name: Industry
description:
INDUSTRY is a prototype factory builder sandbox, created by me (w/playtester 'Water') in the last 4 weeks, for fun.

I have attempted make this system as flexible as possible (with some constraints), hopefully allowing some interesting factory designs.

The main bottleneck right now is rendering times, this is due to the approach i've taken with the actual nodes.

Featuring:

A remarkably compact saving system. (Entire factories fit into less than ~700 KB)

Three-Dimensional Building.

Unconstrained inputs (Import resources from any direction!)

A whopping 27 items and 12 buildings!
